item.title: UIUCTF 2018 - Galactic Brain[fuck] (300pt)
item.description: Galactic Brain[fuck] (300pt) Reversing Description: We brought uiuctfsck back, but we made it worse nc challenges1.uiuc.tf 11338 Files: interpreter.py Solution The stack machine used a character by character comparison to validate the user provided flag and was vulnerable to a timing attack. Overview In the provided python file, we see a multi-machine implementation of the brainfuck programming language. At the top of the file, the flag is imported:
